Class AvatarHeroItem

java.lang.Object
view.AvatarHeroItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<BufferedImage>, FootageFuncs
public class AvatarHeroItem extends Object implements Iterable<BufferedImage>, FootageFuncs
This class represents a choosable player character in DynaSlavePlayer and DynaSlavePlayerNested panels.
